settings.title: Subject
settings.multiple_options:
Please select
Cancellation - I want to cancel my order
Change Request - I want to change my order details
Change Request - I want to change my contact details
Invoice Request - Invoice Request
Order Inquiry - How to place an order
Order Inquiry - What is my Order Status
Product Inquiry - Is this item available
Product Inquiry - Is the product authentic
Refund - I want a refund
Shipping Inquiry - How do I track my order
Shipping Inquiry - I would like to follow up the delivery of my order
Special Assistance - Other Concern
Payment Inquiry - What are my payment options
Return - I want to request for return
